scenario: I'm reviewing the final environmental impact statement for the Jamaica Bus Depot expansion and need to read the report on new.mta.info. If I have concerns about the project or want to ask questions, I need the Office of the Inspector General's address and phone to contact them.
combined_task: Locate and review the Jamaica Bus Depot expansion final EIS report on new.mta.info and obtain the Office of the Inspector General (OIG) contact details to raise any concerns.
selected_subtasks: Get the report from the final environmental impact statement for the Jamaica Bus Depot expansion on new.mta.info.
Find the address and phone of the Office of the Inspector General (OIG).
